Package generalStore

Class GeneralStore

java.lang.Object
generalStore.GeneralStore
public class GeneralStore
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements all the methods for the GeneralStore in the farm simulator.
Version:
22 May 2020.
Author:
Hayley Krippner, Michelle Muchemwa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GeneralStore​(PreGame preGame, GameManager gameManager)
    This method creates a GeneralStore.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deductAnimalPurchase​(Animal animal)
    This method deducts money after an animal is purchased.
    void deductCropPurchase​(Crop crop)
    This method deducts money after a crop is purchased.
    void deductItemPurchase​(Item item)
    This method deducts money after an item is purchased.
    java.lang.String[] displayFarmAnimals()
    This method converts farm animals inventory array list into an array of string type so it can be used to display animals in inventory.
    java.lang.String[] displayFarmCrops()
    This method converts farm crops inventory array list into an array of string type so it can be used to display crops in inventory.
    java.lang.String[] displayFarmItems()
    This method converts farm items inventory array list into an array of string type so it can be used to display items in inventory.
    java.lang.String getItem()  
    void purchaseAnimal()
    This method purchases an animal based on selection input.
    void purchaseCrop()
    This method purchases a crop based on selection input.
    void purchaseItem()
    This method purchases an item based on selection input.
    void setItem​(java.lang.String item)
